topic.title: RetroShare Chat Server - for short invites only
topic.body:
You want to try Retroshare but you have no friends to connect to?
Use that tool which will allow you to connect to a chat room to find friends within the network.

https://retroshare.ch

Notes:

* only the chat service is available (no file transfers, distant chats, channels, search, forums, ...)
* after a while (typically several weeks or days), the server will stop connecting to you to make room for others. You can of course resubmit your ID but it's not necessary if you already have made some friends
* you need Retroshare 0.6.6 or higher, the old certificat format is not supported
* hidden nodes (tor and i2p) are not supported yet

1612049204_17DwXt69rTzQ2mdL3LPLSW9rfNWNQ.body: its not unsecure its helps to bring users to retroshare, which want help on retroshare and want talk or speak with Devs or Testers, or find new friends which using retroshare. its working here
